creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two long white strips with appliqued edges and connecting pieces of black and blue fabric at top and bottom in geometric embroidery overall in white, shades of pink and green; top piece has center square embroidered in red, bottom has small square with diamond inset embroidery; red horizontal strip at top edge with applique and embroidery; geometric embroidery on reverse
title: Baby Carrier
